question: Who inagurated Yoga Institute in Mumbai recently?
explanation: Vice President M Venkaiah Naidu has inaugurated the Centenary celebrations of the Yoga Institute in Mumbai.The institute was founded by Shree Yogendraji Mani Haribhai Desai, the disciple of Paramahans Madhavadasji in 1918. The word Yoga is derived from two roots - One signifying "connection" and the second signifying "concentration". National Yoga Day is celebrated on June 21.
